在一项大胆的监管举措中，美国证券交易委员会 (SEC) 已采取措施冻结 Binance.US 的资产，以应对违反证券法的指控。

6 月 5 日，SEC 对币安、其首席执行官赵长鹏（广为人知的 CZ）和 Binance.US 采取法律行动，理由是其被认为违反了美国的证券立法。 SEC 还指控 Binance.US 将客户的资金与 CZ 控制下的商业实体混合。作为同一诉讼的一部分，监管机构将包括 Solana 和 Cardano 在内的十种加密货币命名为证券。

提交文件中的要点表明，限制令有必要冻结交易所的资产，目的是“维持现状，防止资本耗散或转移”到另一个司法管辖区。这一步骤还将维护法院“以没收、判决前利息和民事处罚形式给予救济”的能力。

文件规定：

“被告 BAM Management 和 BAM Trading 及其代理人、雇员、雇员、实际代理人以及那些积极一致的人 (...)转让、耗散、隐藏或以其他方式处置他们的任何资金或其他资产或有价值的东西（……）”

该文件还强调，客户资金必须在法院批准后五天内完全由 BAM Trading 控制。 SEC 的主要目标是撤销 Binance 及其 CEO Zhao 的能力或参与美国客户资源的转移或撤回。该文件继续指出：

“确保被告 Binance、被告 Zhao 或任何 Binance 实体均未获得对客户资产的占有、保管或控制权，包括在未事先获得许可的情况下被指定为持有客户资产的任何账户或钱包的账户持有人或签字人法院的”

此外，该提交请求 Binance.US 将所有加密资产重定向到具有新私钥和管理密钥的不同钱包。它还假定这些新颖的细节不得移交给 Binance、CZ 或相关机构。该措施应在法院发布限制令后 30 天内最终确定。

批准后，首席执行官和首席财务官需要为任何超过 100,000 美元的转移提供书面批准。此外，Binance.US 可能被允许将其质押服务转移到 BitGo 或 Aegis，前提是满足 SEC 的要求。

Binance.US 通过 Twitter 帖子回应了美国证券交易委员会的指控，宣布初步禁令申请没有根据。加密货币交易所的美国子公司对这种困境表示失望。

CZ 强化了 Binance.US 的立场，利用他的 Twitter 账户阐明 SEC 的行动仅针对 Binance.US 而不是其母网站 Binance.com。他进一步减轻了社区的恐惧，维护了他们投资的安全性。

;

如果您发现自己正面临 Discord 无法运行、卡在加载屏幕上或根本无法运行等令人沮丧的问题，那么您并不孤单。

Discord 是深受游戏玩家和社区喜爱的流行交流平台，偶尔会遇到无法在 Windows 操作系统上打开或正常运行的问题。许多用户遇到过类似的障碍，例如 Discord 宕机或无法更新到最新版本。

在这份综合指南中，我们将探讨这些问题的各种潜在原因，并提供专家解决方案来帮助您解决这些问题。

为什么 Discord 不能在 Windows 上运行？

要了解为什么 Discord 可能会卡在 Windows 屏幕上或无法在您的计算机上打开，重要的是要认识到可能存在多种根本原因。虽然并非所有问题都得到了充分理解，但一些用户已经确定了一些可能有助于诊断问题根源的潜在触发因素。

以下是 Discord 无法开放的几个原因：

Discord 被另一个程序阻止：一个常见的情况是另一个应用程序阻止 Discord 正确启动。这通常发生在防病毒程序中，可能会错误地将 Discord 标记为威胁。

Discord 正在经历中断：虽然很少见，但有时会出现 Discord 的服务器出现临时停机，导致用户无法访问该平台的情况。要检查 Discord 的实时状态，请使用Discord 服务器状态站点。

游戏正在您的设备上运行：Discord 集成了与您计算机上运行的游戏同步的各种功能。在某些情况下，游戏内覆盖功能可能会阻止 Discord 在游戏已经运行时打开，这可能会导致玩家冲突。

文件损坏或丢失：您的 Discord 文件可能已损坏、损坏甚至完全丢失。在这种情况下，在再次启动 Discord 之前恢复这些基本文件变得至关重要。

Windows 相关问题：Discord 的功能也会受到偶尔会干扰其运行的一般错误的影响。这些问题可能包括硬件存储空间不足、CPU 过载或互联网连接配置不当。

虽然这些是最常遇到的问题，但以下指南将帮助您恢复 Discord，即使您遇到的是特殊情况。

事不宜迟，让我们深入研究故障排除方法并让您的 Discord 恢复运行。

如何修复 Discord 无法正常工作的问题

在深入研究技术解决方案之前，如果 Discord 无法打开、卡在更新中或显示灰屏，您可以尝试快速修复。一些 Windows 用户报告称，通过访问网络版 Discord 成功解决了这些问题。

您可以尝试以下操作：

使用网络版：访问discord.com并使用您的凭据登录以访问网络版 Discord。登录后，在您的 PC 上启动 Discord 应用程序，它应该可以正常工作。

让您的设备保持更新：让您的操作系统保持最新状态对于包括 Discord 在内的各种应用程序的平稳运行至关重要。确保您的 Windows 系统已安装所有最新更新。

重新安装 Discord ：如果一切都失败了，请考虑卸载并重新安装 Discord 应用程序。此过程可以帮助解决可能导致 Discord 出现故障的任何潜在安装问题。

如果这些初始步骤不能解决 Discord 无法运行的问题，请不要担心。下面，我们将提供其他方法和分步说明来解决 Discord 不工作错误。

清除本地 AppData 以修复 Discord 不工作

Windows 将缓存文件存储在 AppData 文件夹中，如果您的系统用于 Discord 必要缓存的存储空间不足，清除此文件夹可以为 Discord 的文件腾出空间。

以下是如何进行：

  1. 按 Windows + R 键打开运行实用程序
  2. 键入“%appdata%”并单击“确定”以访问文件资源管理器中的 AppData 文件夹
  3. 找到 Discord 文件夹，右键单击它，然后选择删除

重新启动计算机并检查 Discord 不工作错误是否已解决。如果问题仍然存在，请继续执行下一个解决方案。

从安装位置启动 Discord

一些用户报告说直接从其安装文件夹启动 Discord 是成功的。

按着这些次序：

  1. 打开文件资源管理器
  2. 导航到以下文件夹：C:\ProgramData%user%\Discord（确保将“user”替换为您的本地帐户用户名）
  3. 双击 discord.exe 文件启动应用程序

如果这不起作用，请右键单击它并选择“以管理员身份运行”以使用管理权限启动 Discord。通过这样做，您可能能够解决 Discord 无法正常工作的问题。

使用命令提示符关闭 Discord

如果 Discord 似乎正在运行但卡住或无法打开，终止进程并重新启动 Discord 可能会有所帮助。

按照以下步骤使用命令提示符关闭 Discord：

  1. 按 Windows + R 键打开运行
  2. 键入“cmd”并按 Ctrl + Shift + Enter 以启动具有管理权限的命令提示符
  3. 输入命令“taskkill /F /IM discord.exe”回车终止Discord进程

关闭命令提示符并尝试重新打开 Discord 以确认 Discord 无法正常工作的问题已得到解决。如果没有，请继续下一步。

运行系统文件检查器

系统文件检查器 (SFC) 是大多数 Windows 版本中的内置工具，可以自动修复损坏的系统文件。

要运行 SFC 扫描并可能解决 Discord 无法正常工作的问题，请执行以下步骤：

  1. 按 Windows + R 键打开运行
  2. 键入“cmd”并按 Ctrl + Shift + Enter 以启动具有管理权限的命令提示符
  3. 如果出现提示，请单击“是”以允许命令提示符进行更改
  4. 在命令提示符中，键入“sfc /scannow”并按 Enter 键开始扫描
  5. 等待扫描完成并修复任何损坏的文件

重新启动您的设备并检查Discord是否正常打开。

关闭在后台运行的应用程序

如果后台没有运行关键应用程序，关闭所有后台程序可以帮助解决 Discord 的打开问题。

按着这些次序：

  1. 使用 Windows + I 键盘快捷键或“开始”菜单的齿轮图标打开“设置”应用程序
  2. 单击“隐私”选项卡
  3. 从侧面菜单中选择“后台应用程序”
  4. 关闭“让应用程序在后台运行”选项

重新启动计算机并查看 Discord 是否正常打开。

手动更新或重新安装 Discord

如果之前的方法都不起作用，请考虑手动更新或重新安装 Discord。

就是这样：

  1. 在浏览器中访问下载 Discord 页面
  2. 为您的系统选择合适的 Discord 版本并下载
  3. 按照安装说明更新或重新安装 Discord

通过尝试这些故障排除方法，您应该能够解决 Discord 在 Windows 上无法运行或无法打开的问题。

在尝试这些解决方案之前，请记住检查 Discord 中断并确保您的系统是最新的。

如果问题仍然存在，您可以向Discord 的支持团队或社区论坛寻求进一步的帮助。

Genshin Impact 背后的开发商 HoYoverse 最近推出了 Honkai：Star Rail，这是一款发生在 Honkai 宇宙中的新gacha 游戏。尽管设置在同一个宇宙中，但它并不是崩坏 3rd 的直接续集。 Honkai: Star Rail 遵循回合制策略 RPG 格式。

与频繁提供兑换码的原神类似，崩坏：星轨也为玩家提供兑换码，可在游戏发售日领取。在本文中，我们将讨论可用于《崩坏：星际铁路》的三种兑换代码，解释如何兑换它们，并重点介绍玩家可以获得的其他物品，以开启他们的开拓之旅。

在其第一次更新版本 1.1 中，《崩坏：星轨》引入了三个新角色。更新的前半部分引入了新的 5 星单位银狼，而后半部分则带来了两个虚构角色，分别是罗刹和御空。这些角色分别遵循丰富和和谐的道路，并被归类为虚构角色。此外，1.1 版更新包括专门针对 2023 年 6 月的新兑换代码。

崩坏：星轨 1.1 版于 2023 年 6 月发布，包含两个新的兑换代码。

新崩坏：2023 年 6 月星际铁路代码：

  • BSN2EWMHA4RP
  • 惊喜1024

Old Honkai：星轨代码：

  • HSRGRANDOPEN1（兑换 100 星玉）
  • HSRGRANDOPEN2（兑换100星玉）
  • HSRGRANDOPEN3（兑换100星玉）
  • HSRVER10XEDLFE（兑换 50 颗星玉）
  • STARRAILGIFT（兑换 50 颗星玉）
  • HSRVER10JYTGHC（五月打码，兑换50星辰翡翠）

兑换崩坏：星际铁路代码

要兑换 HSR 代码，请按照下列步骤操作：

  • 登录崩坏：星轨兑换码网站https://hsr.hoyoverse.com/gift 。
  • 确保您已经创建了一个帐户。该网站需要注册个人资料才能成功兑换代码。
  • 手动将代码输入到网站上提供的字段中。
  • 在提交之前仔细检查您输入的代码是否正确。

或者，您可以按照以下步骤在游戏中兑换代码：

  • 玩《崩坏：星际铁路》并取得进展，直到您解锁游戏内菜单。
  • 查找 Trailblazer Profile 部分并找到 MC（主要角色）名称旁边的菜单按钮。
  • 通过单击菜单按钮访问 Trailblazer 配置文件。
  • 在 Trailblazer 个人资料中，找到兑换代码按钮。
  • 单击“兑换代码”按钮以输入代码并领取奖励。

无论是通过网站还是在游戏中，请记得在输入代码时确保代码的准确性，以确保成功兑换。

为什么在《崩坏：星际铁路》中需要 Stellar Jades？

在《崩坏：星轨》中，玩家使用的主要货币是 Stellar Jade，其作用与《原神》中的 Primogems 类似。玩家可以将 Stellar Jades 用于 gacha 系统，在 Honkai 中称为 Warp：Star Rail，每天最多可补充 8 次 Trailblaze Power。与 Genshin Impact 类似，《崩坏：星际轨道》中的每个 Warp 花费 160 个 Stellar Jades。 Warping 有两种货币：星际铁路通票和星际铁路特别通票。前者用于 Standard Warp，而后者专门用于 Limited Banner，后者将在游戏发布时以 Honkai：Star Rail Seele 为特色。

对于新玩家，将有一个新手旗帜可用，使他们能够以 40 个为代价获得 50 个 Warps。此外，在进行 40 次拉动后，玩家将保证获得 5 星奖励。

  • 100,000 积分

  • Serval（4 星闪电博学角色）

随着玩家在游戏中的进步和升级，他们将获得更多的星际铁路通行证和星辰玉石，达到 Trailblaze 等级 35 时有可能获得多达 40 条通行证和 1600 颗星辰玉石。

《崩坏：星际铁路》的推出将设有一个登录活动，玩家在登录 7 天内总共可以获得 10 张星际铁路特别通行证。

什么是街头霸王 6 帧数据系统？

Street Fighter 6 中的帧表精确地代表了每个单独的帧。当以慢动作观察时，可以辨别与仪表中显示的每一帧对齐的战斗机动画的细微变化。

Street Fighter 6 中的帧表类型

Street Fighter 6 Frame Data 系统用作有关在游戏中执行特定类型移动所需的帧数的信息库。它将每个动作分成不同的部分或类型，让玩家对力学有一个全面的了解。

框架数据中记录的每个动作都包含三个关键的框架阶段：

  1. 启动框架
  2. 活动框架
  3. 恢复框架

启动框架

这个初始动作触发了攻击动画。启动帧的数量通常取决于所执行的攻击类型，严重的攻击会消耗更多的启动帧并使攻击者容易受到攻击。

在 Street Fighter 6 Frame Data 系统中，启动帧用绿色框表示。

活动框架

在此帧中，角色抓住或攻击对手，如果他们在范围内则造成伤害。快速出拳或踢腿具有较少的主动帧和启动帧，而较重的攻击需要更多帧。

In the Street Fighter 6 Frame Data system, the active frames are represented by the red section.

Recovery Frame

This swift cooldown period occurs after successfully landing an attack. During the recovery time, the character is vulnerable and unable to execute any moves. The heaviness of the attack directly influences the duration of the recovery frames.

This stage signifies the character's return to a neutral state after an attack and is represented by blue boxes in the frame meter.

Advantages and disadvantages of frame data in SF6

In Street Fighter 6 Frame Data system, frame advantages and disadvantages can be determined by analyzing the frame numbers. A positive number signifies a frame advantage, enabling the player to act before their opponent returns to a neutral state.

Conversely, a negative number indicates that the opponent will recover more swiftly, potentially leaving the player vulnerable to attacks.

For instance, a +5 frame advantage means the player can act 5 frames ahead of their opponent, allowing for punishing maneuvers.

On the other hand, a -5 frame disadvantage implies susceptibility to attacks for the next 5 frames until recovery.

The frame advantage or disadvantage primarily depends on the startup and recovery frames of an attack. These two phases pose risks of being caught off guard if the opponent's attack possesses fewer startup or recovery frames.

The advantage a player gains hinges upon the type of attack they choose to employ in a given situation. To determine the frame advantage, one can compare the frame meter of both players when executing a move and identify which character's move proves faster than the other.

On-hit advantage and on-block situations

Achieving excellence in Street Fighter 6 requires a profound understanding of the movement frames associated with most fighters. By ûsing frame knowledge, players can gain an edge over their opponents with an on-hit advantage.

If both players initiate an attack simultaneously, the one with fewer startup frames is more likely to land a successful hit due to frame advantage. During the player's attack, a yellow bar appears in the opponent's frame meter, representing the "Hit Stun" period, wherein the opponent is unable to perform any moves.

If the player's recovery frames are fewer than the hit stun frames, they maintain an advantage and can execute a follow-up attack with startup frames less than the hit stun period, resulting in a successful hit.

On the other hand, on-block situations occur when a player successfully blocks an attack and recovers faster than the opponent, preventing them from returning to a neutral state.

If the opponent dodges or blocks a heavy kick, for instance, the player will be at an on-block disadvantage, as the opponent recovers more swiftly.

In such instances, the opponent can initiate any attack with startup frames of 6 or fewer to successfully land a hit.

Additional frame types in the frame meter

Beyond the three primary frame stages, the frame meter encompasses several other frame types that provide further information about various attack categories, including aerial attacks and projectiles.

Invincibility Period : Certain characters possess moves accompanied by an invincibility period, during which they cannot be harmed. For example, Ryu's Dragon Punch in the frame data exhibits an invincibility duration of 3 frames. These invincibility frames are depicted with white and grey striped boxes, signifying the player's invulnerability.

Strike Invincible Period : Some characters possess moves that can only be cancelled by projectiles. Strike Invincible Frames denote a period during which the player cannot sustain damage from strike attacks but remains susceptible to projectile attacks. These frames are illustrated by white and red stripes on the frame meter.

Projectile Invincibility Period : Projectile Invincible Frames represent the duration in which the player remains impervious to damage from projectile attacks but remains vulnerable to strike attacks. These frames are denoted by yellow and white stripes on the frame meter.

Final thoughts on Street Fighter 6 Frame Data

Understanding frame data in Street Fighter 6 confers a significant advantage during fights and combats, particularly for those aspiring to compete at the highest levels. Normal attacks typically exhibit startup frames ranging from 3 to 12, contingent upon the specific type of attack initiated.

Throws and projectiles generally have 5 frames, while special attacks and combos can vary from 3 to 60 frames.

After having enabled passkeys support for personal Google accounts last month, Google has now unlocked support for passkeys for Workspace customers and environments.

Passkeys is an upcoming authentication standard that replaces traditional passwords with cryptographic keys. These keys are generated on the user's device and a private part of the key never leaves it. Users who have set up passkeys for an account do not need to enter passwords anymore when they sign-in. Instead, they verify the request locally by entering their device's PIN or through biometric authentication.

Passkeys void common forms of attacks against passwords, including phishing and brute forcing. Support is still in the works on some platforms, eg, Android 14 will introduce support for storing passkeys using third-party apps, such as password managers , and that is also true for synchronization functionality.

In Google's case, it is possible to authenticate using a mobile device on new devices for which passkeys are not available yet. This is done by scanning a QR code that is displayed on the new device using the phone's camera.

Passkeys support for Google Workspace

The feature has beta tags currently and Google explains on a support page how administrators may enable passkeys for users of their organization.

Passkeys allow users of an organization to authenticate without having to enter account passwords or verifying the sign-in using two-factor authentication. Authentication happens using a mobile device, a security key, or the computer's screen lock protection.

Administrators need to enable the skip passwords option in the Google Admin console. Here is a step-by-step guide on enabling the "skip passwords" feature in the admin console:

  1. Open the Admin console.
  2. Navigate to Menu >; Security >; Authentication >; Passwordless.
  3. Select "Skip passwords".
  4. Optionally, select "Allow users to skip passwords at sign-in by using passkeys" to allow users to skip password challenges during sign-in.
  5. Select Save to complete the process.

Users who have created passkeys may continue using them for authentication, even if an administrator turns off the feature at a later point in the admin console. Note that the password challenge is not skipped in that case, and that the passkey may be used for that second step of authentication then.

Users will need to enable the passkeys feature for their accounts then by creating a passkey for the account.

Google has another support page that explains in detail how users can do so. The page lists current requirements and the necessary steps to generate a passkey for the account and start using it.

iOS 17 is finally here and it's packed with a lot of new features. Let's learn how to change Contact Photo on iPhone in today's tutorial.

Apple's recent WWDC 2023 event unveiled a range of exciting products and upcoming software updates. Among the notable features of iOS 17 is the option to customize your Contact Photo and Poster, providing a unique way to greet others when they receive your calls on an iPhone.

This innovative addition to iOS aims to enhance the personalization and user-friendliness of phone calls, allowing you to select how you appear on the recipient's screen. If you're eager to experience this new feature firsthand and greet your loved ones with a personalized touch whenever you call, here's a step-by-step guide on how to change your Contact Photo and Poster on your iPhone.

What is Contact Photo and Poster on iOS 17?

The Contact Photo and Poster feature introduced in iOS 17 provides users with the ability to customize their appearance on someone's iPhone whenever a call is made. With this feature, you have the option to select from various elements such as memoji, personalized photos, and font styles to display your name when contacting others.

This exciting addition brings a new level of creativity and personalization to the act of greeting someone even before they answer your call. By allowing users to choose their preferred photo, color scheme, font style, and even memoji, this feature ensures that you can create a distinctive contact poster that aligns with your aesthetic preferences and showcases your unique style.

Change Contact Photo and Poster on iOS 17

To begin, the initial step involves creating your personal contact or "My card" on your iPhone. This card can later be customized to incorporate your Contact Photo and Poster. Follow the instructions provided below to assist you in setting up and utilizing this feature on your iPhone.

First step: Create My card

  1. Open the Contacts app on your iPhone and locate the + icon positioned in the top right corner.
  2. Enter the desired name and other pertinent details for your My card.
  3. Once completed, tap on "+ add phone".
  4. Enter your phone number along with the applicable area code if necessary.
  5. Include any additional details to customize your My card.
  6. When finished creating your contact, tap "Done" located in the top right corner.
  7. Now, open the Settings app, scroll down, and select "Contacts".
  8. Tap on "My info".
  9. Choose the contact that was recently created to set it as your My card.
  10. 就是这样！ You can now proceed to the next step to set up a customized Contact Photo and Poster on your iPhone.

Second step: Change your Contact Photo and Poster

You have the ability to create and set your Contact Photo and Poster on your iPhone for your My card. If you haven't yet created a My card, please refer to the previous step to create one before proceeding with the following instructions for creating your Contact Photo and Poster. Let's begin.

  1. Open the Contacts app on your iPhone and tap on your My card located at the top.
  2. Tap on "Contact Photo & Poster".
  3. Next, tap on "First name" and enter the desired first name you want to be visible when calling someone.
  4. Similarly, set your Last name.
  5. Once you're finished, tap on "Edit" at the top.
  6. You will find three preset choices for your Contact Photo & Poster. Swipe to select any of the presets.
  7. If you wish to customize a preset, tap on "Customize" at the bottom.
  8. If you want to create a new Contact Photo and Poster, tap on the "+" icon in the bottom right corner.
  9. Alternatively, you can swipe all the way to the right and tap on "Create New" at the bottom.
  10. Tap and select the type of poster you wish to create for yourself.

How to create a Contact Poster from your Camera?

To create your Contact Poster with a real-time photo, follow these steps:

  1. Tap on "Camera" at the bottom to initiate the process.
  2. Frame your photo as needed and customize the lens options according to your preference.
  3. When you're ready, tap the Shutter icon to capture the photo.
  4. If you're satisfied with the captured image, tap "Use Photo".
  5. If you want to retake the photo, tap "Retake" to capture it again.
  6. The photo will now be added to your Contact Poster. Tap on your name at the top to customize it.
  7. Tap and select your preferred font from the available choices at the top.
  8. Use the slider to customize the font weight for your name.
  9. Swipe through the options at the bottom and tap to choose your preferred color for your name.
  10. If desired, you can tap the Color wheel to select a custom color.
  11. Once you have chosen the color, use the slider at the bottom to adjust its vibrancy if available.
  12. Tap the X icon when you're done customizing.
  13. You can use the Pinch gesture to zoom in or out of your photo.
  14. Tap "Done" once you have finished customizing your Contact Poster.

That's how you can utilize the camera to capture a photo in real-time and use it as your Contact Poster.

How to create a Contact Poster from your Photos?

To create a Contact Poster using one of your existing photos, follow these steps:

  1. Tap on "Photos" at the bottom to utilize one of your existing photos with your Contact Poster.
  2. Scroll through your photos and tap to select your preferred photo.
  3. Use the Pinch gesture to zoom in or out of the photo as desired.
  4. Swipe left on the Contact Poster to explore different effects that can be applied to your poster. You should have access to the following choices:
    • Natural: This option maintains the natural look of your photo while applying a subtle blur effect to the top portion where your name will be displayed.
    • Natural Gradient: Selecting this option adds a natural gradient to your photo based on its overall color palette. You can tap the gradient color icon and choose the shade you prefer.
    • Seamless Background: This choice adds a colored background to your image. Tap the color icon to select one of the presets or set a custom color according to your preference. Use the slider at the bottom to adjust the color's vibrancy.
    • Seamless Background Mono: This option applies a monochromatic filter to your image while allowing you to set a colored background, similar to the previous choice. You can choose a custom background color or one of the presets, adjusting the color's vibrancy using the slider.
    • Poster: This filter gives a posterized look to your image. You can choose a preset or custom color to be used with this filter.
    • Studio: This option applies the Studio Portrait Lighting effect, which is also available in the Camera app. Tap the lighting icon to choose between high-key or low-key lighting based on your preferences.
    • Black & White: As the name suggests, this option applies a black and white filter to the image while allowing you to choose between a dark or light background.
    • Color Backdrop: This choice adds a colored backdrop to the image while highlighting the subject. Tap the color icon to select one of the presets for the background and use the slider to adjust its vibrancy.
    • Duotone: This filter applies a popular duotone effect to your image, gradually transitioning between two colors. Tap the color icon to choose your preferred duotone filter.
    • Color Wash: This filter applies a color wash effect to the entire image, similar to the one available for lock screen backgrounds since iOS 16. Tap the color icon to select your preferred color for the filter.

To further customize your Contact Poster using an existing image, follow these steps:

  1. Tap on your name at the top to adjust the font and font weight.
  2. Swipe through the options at the top and choose your preferred font.
  3. Use the slider to adjust the font weight to your liking.
  4. Tap and select a preferred color from the choices available at the bottom of the screen.
  5. Use the slider to adjust the vibrancy of the color as desired.
  6. Once you are satisfied with the result, tap the X icon to confirm your selection.
  7. If you wish to disable the Depth Effect, tap the 3-dot icon and then tap on it to turn it off.
  8. Tap on "Done" in the top right corner when you are happy with your Contact Poster.

How to create a Memoji Contact Poster?

To create and use a Memoji Contact Poster on your iPhone, follow these steps:

  1. Tap on "Memoji" at the bottom.
  2. Select your preferred Memoji by tapping on it.
  3. Hold the phone in front of your face and ensure that your face is recognized. Create your desired expression, and when ready, tap the Shutter icon to capture an image. Alternatively, you can tap and choose a preferred expression from the options at the bottom of the screen.
  4. Tap "Next" once you have finished capturing or selecting your expression.
  5. Now, tap the color icon located in the bottom left corner to choose your preferred background color.
  6. Use the slider at the bottom to adjust the vibrancy of the selected color.
  7. Tap on your name at the top.
  8. Swipe through the options and choose your preferred font for your name from the available choices at the top.
  9. Adjust the font weight using the slider.
  10. Swipe through the choices at the bottom and select your preferred font color for your name.
  11. Tap the X icon once you have finished customizing.
  12. Finally, tap "Done" to complete the creation of your Memoji Contact Poster.

How to create a Monogram Contact Poster?

To create a Monogram Contact Poster on your iPhone, follow these steps:

  1. Tap on "Monogram" at the bottom of your screen.
  2. Tap the color icon and select your preferred background color for the Monogram.
  3. Tap on your name at the top.
  4. Swipe through the options at the top and choose your preferred font for your name.
  5. Use the slider to set the preferred font weight. This will also affect the font weight of your initials in the Monogram.
  6. Swipe through the choices at the bottom and select your preferred font color for your name.
  7. Use the slider to adjust the vibrancy of the selected color.
  8. Tap the X icon once you have finished customizing your name.
  9. Tap on your initials located in the bottom right corner to customize them.
  10. Edit your initials as needed.
  11. Tap "Done" once you have finished editing your initials.
  12. Similarly, tap "Done" in the top right corner once you are satisfied with your Monogram Contact Poster.

Once you have finished creating your preferred Contact Poster, a preview of the poster will be shown:

  1. If you are satisfied with the preview, tap "Continue" at the bottom to proceed.
  2. After tapping "Continue," you will be prompted to edit your contact photo. Tap on "Crop" to make edits and reposition the image.
  3. Use the Pinch gesture to adjust and reposition the image as needed.
  4. Tap "Choose" once you are happy with the outcome.
  5. Various filter choices will be available at the bottom of your screen. Tap and select your preferred filter to apply it.
  6. Tap "Done" in the top right corner when you are satisfied with the outcome.
  7. Tap on "Update."
  8. You will be asked if you wish to use this contact picture everywhere. Depending on your preferences, tap "Use" or "Not Now."
  9. Now, tap and enable the toggle for "Name & Photo Sharing."
  10. Next, choose one of the following options based on your privacy preferences:"Contacts Only" or "Always Ask"
